notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the postgresql SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.8. It addresses 7 CVEs: CVE-2023-39418, CVE-2024-10976, CVE-2024-10978, CVE-2024-10979, CVE-2024-4317, and 2 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: postgresql security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.8
